item.wyrmroostpatch.tincture_tooltip: Feed this to a tamed alpine dragon to change its color.
item.wyrmroostpatch.tincture_disabled: Alpine recoloring is disabled by config.
item.wyrmroostpatch.halfnugget.tooltip: Feed this to another rooststalker to breed it.
item.wyrmroostpatch.feed.tooltip_alp: Feed this to an alpine dragon to breed it.
item.wyrmroostpatch.feed.tooltip_alp_hal: Feed this to a second alpine dragon to breed it.
item.wyrmroostpatch.feed.tooltip_bfl: Feed this to a butterfly leviathan to breed it.
item.wyrmroostpatch.feed.tooltip_bfl_hal: Feed this to a second butterfly leviathan to breed it.
item.wyrmroostpatch.feed.tooltip_fail: Tooltip generation failed, dragon not recognized.
